body_html: Interesting, your np.take expression ought to be equivalent to the fancy indexing, but maybe pytables doesn't fully support the fancy expression. Do you want to send a PR? Looks like yours is strictly more robust.
body_text: Interesting, your np.take expression ought to be equivalent to the fancy indexing, but maybe pytables doesn't fully support the fancy expression. Do you want to send a PR? Looks like yours is strictly more robust.
body: Interesting, your `np.take` expression ought to be equivalent to the fancy indexing, but maybe pytables doesn't fully support the fancy expression. Do you want to send a PR? Looks like yours is strictly more robust.
